document.full_text: in may 2008, a blog post caught computer maker dell inc by surprise: popular tech blog gizmodo had broken news about dell's inspiron 910 mini-notebook -- months ahead of its launch -- after seeing ceo michael dell toting the notebook at an industry conference.
document.title: analysis: on cloud 2: making fans of customers on social media
lines_and_colors: in may 2008, a blog post caught computer maker dell inc by surprise: popular tech blog gizmodo had broken news about dell's inspiron 910 mini-notebook -- months ahead of its launch -- after seeing ceo michael dell toting the notebook at an industry conference.
